changeSet.author: neha
changeSet.sql: insert into user_recent_resources (id ,user_id, workspace_id, resource_type, resource_id, last_access_date) select id, user_id, workspace_id, case when cohort_id IS NOT NULL then 1 when concept_set_id IS NOT NULL then 2 else 3 end as resource_type, case when cohort_id IS NOT NULL then cohort_id when concept_set_id IS NOT NULL then concept_set_id else notebook_name end as resource_id, lastAccessDate from user_recent_resource;
